about_the_game:
This is a prologue chapter for Arcane Raise, presented as a DEMO product. This unique short quest is available to be played for FREE and will NOT be included in the final version of the game. This demo version tells a parallel story and contains a unique small area which will NOT be featured in the full game. So don't worry about spoilers and jump right in!

Purchase full game here:
detailed_description:
This is a prologue chapter for Arcane Raise, presented as a DEMO product. This unique short quest is available to be played for FREE and will NOT be included in the final version of the game. This demo version tells a parallel story and contains a unique small area which will NOT be featured in the full game. So don't worry about spoilers and jump right in!

Purchase full game here:

name: -Arcane Raise- Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz Intel Atom Z2460 or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Audio player which supports .Ogg format or codecs
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-Core @ 2.5 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT 730 or better
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: .Ogg Codecs

short_description: Aurora Novus is a FREE DEMO for the Arcane Raise Franchise.
